text: Calyptostoma is a genus of mites in the family Calyptostomatidae. There are about six described species in Calyptostoma. Cranefly with Mite ==Species== These six species belong to the genus Calyptostoma: * Calyptostoma giuliae Haitlinger & Šundić, 2015 * Calyptostoma gorganica Saboori & Soukhstaraii, 2012 * Calyptostoma latiseta Shiba, 1976 * Calyptostoma marantica Haitlinger & Šundić, 2015 * Calyptostoma simplexa Shiba, 1976 * Calyptostoma velutinum (Müller, 1776) ==References== ==Further reading== * Category:Trombidiformes genera
title: Calyptostoma
